document_data.name: Dawnbringer Company
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dawnbringer Company''' was a band of adventurers from [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: In [[1024 DR]], they plundered the crypt of [[Uruth Ukrypt]]'s orcs. In response to this, the [[Brotherhood of the Scarlet Scourge]] formed an [[orc]] horde named the [[Broken Bone]] with the intent of destroying Waterdeep, but they were attacked by the [[dragon]] [[Lhammaruntosz]] and defeated.
